name: LoungeflyThe Lion King: Pride Rock Mini-rugzak - Merchoid Nederland
description: Assembling our pride rock li- I mean, Lion King themed backpack! It's time to take a trip down memory lane with Simba, Nala and the rest of the pride lands. Can you feel the love tonight? No, literally, can you feel it? Because this backpack is so soft! You'll never have to worry about the long haul, because carrying this backpack is Hakuna Matata! On the front of the backpack, it's the circle of life with young Simba and Nala standing tall on Pride Rock with Rafiki watching over them. I bet Mufasa's spirit is giving his son a big thumbs up from the sky. Scar and the hyenas can be found below, looking positively dastardly as they stand guard over the zipped compartment. Keep your treats safe and sound from the villains! And if young Simba's the face of the front, you can bet your bottom dollar he's in the back too!So not only will everyone see the backpack's colorful design when looking at you, but they'll also catch a glimpse of young Simba on the back. Showcasing its incredible attention to detail and coordinating inside lining, this backpack is the ultimate Disney accessory for your everyday wear. It's got a place for everything you need, with pockets on either side and the ability to adjust the straps' length! This backpack is officially licensed Disney merchandise, guaranteeing that you're getting the best quality bag possible. But wait, there's more! Made from vegan leather (polyurethane), this backpack features exquisite and attention-worthy gold metal hardware. The metal zipper charm will definitely catch the attention of everyone you pass, while the applique, embroidery, and printed work are sure to show off your love for the amazing movie that is The Lion King. So, why wait? Let's see what this backpack has in store. Dimensions:- Width: 9" - Height: 10.5"- Depth: 4.5" Now that you're ready to step into the pride lands, here are some features that make this backpack even sweeter: - Officially licensed Disney product- Stylish applique, embroidery, and print designs - Gold metal hardware and charm for extra fine detailing - Adjustable straps for a comfortable fit - Pockets on either side for even more storage options - Made from vegan leather (polyurethane) for a cruelty-free accessory - The perfect size for an everyday companion with dimensions of 9"W x 10.5"H x 4.5"D.Product DetailsProduct type: Mini BackpackLicense: The Lion KingManufacturer: LoungeflySpecificaties Gewicht: Ongeveer 750 gram (26 ounces) Land van herkomst: China Materialen: Kunstleer (polyurethaan) SKU: WDBK2147GTIN: 671803403666
